item.title: Running asciidoctor-pdf on TeamCity
item.description: I’ve been using asciidoctor-pdf to generate PDF and while I was initially running the tool locally I eventually decided to setup a build on TeamCity. It was a bit trickier than I expected, mostly because I’m not that familiar with deploying Ruby applications, but I thought I’d capture what I’ve done for future me. I have the following Gemfile that installs asciidoctor-pdf and its dependencies: Gemfile source 'https://rubygems.
